text: Kare-ra wa, jibun ga isurāmu ni kie shite, anata ni taisuru on o hodokoshita yō ni omotte iru. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata no kie wa, watashi e no megumi to wa naranai. Moshi anata gataga shinjitsu (kie shita)nara, arrā wa, anata gata o shinkō ni michibiku koto o, anata gata e no megumi to nasareru nodearu
